episodes.title: Understanding the World of Cults
episodes.description: In observance of Cult Awareness Day, this episode focuses on life inside a cult, and then leaving and start life over. FEATURED GUESTS: - GEOFF LEVIN is a musician, composer, producer, and film director of the “Brothers Broken” documentary on his life in and now out of scientology. Watch the trailer and learn more: https://www.brothersbroken.com/ - TAMARA MC was raised in a cult, but got out of it and became a world traveler, writer, and activist for girls and women worldwide. See her website for resources including a pages listing "325 Ways to Know if You are in a Cult" - see: https://tamaramc.com/are-you-in-a-cult/ - MATT COST is a prolific author of historical fiction and mystery, and the inspiration behind this episode. More: https://www.mattcost.net/ Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
